items.summary: Senior Product Manager: Leading product strategy for Australia's largest freight marketplace platform.
bullets: AI-Powered Freight Matching: Driving the development of AI-driven matching algorithms to connect shippers with the most suitable carriers, improving match rate and reducing manual effort for 200,000+ monthly quote requests.
Membership Model Redesign: Redesigned the carrier subscription model, introducing tiered plans that increased paid membership conversion and improved platform revenue per user.

Enterprise Client Solutions: Built B2B product features for enterprise shippers including bulk booking, API integrations, and dedicated account management tools to grow the high-value customer segment.
Data-Driven Product Strategy: Established product analytics frameworks and OKR-driven roadmaps to align cross-functional teams across engineering, design, and commercial on key growth metrics.

items.company: Independent Developer - AI Software Applications & Consulting Services
items.summary: AI Software Development and Paid Consulting Services, with 12K ARR.
bullets: Product Development Portfolio: Developed multiple AI-powered applications including job-seeker (automated job application system), auto-fill (chrome extension), capcam (ios app), and various custom AI solutions for business automation and productivity enhancement.

Consulting for Graduates & Content Creators: Provided specialised consulting for recent graduates and content creators, focusing on career planning, content strategy, and AI tool integration to boost efficiency and build personal brand value.

items.company: Alibaba Cloud - Banma Smart Cockpit Solutions Product Department
items.summary: Product Leader: Responsible for the planning and implementation of the in-vehicle interactive cloud application and intelligent voice assistant.
bullets: In-Vehicle Citylife Service Cloud Application: Covered 200,000 in-vehicle devices, with 10% average weekly active users rate.
In-Vehicle AI Voice Assistant: Developed for LS6 engineering vehicles and exhibited at Chengdu International Auto Show. Features include office assistance and traffic violation identification.

items.company: Alibaba Group - Taobao Consulting Product Department
items.summary: Product Leader: Oversaw the design and implementation of Taobao platform consulting services.
bullets: Merchant Support Chatbot: Supported 20,000 daily conversations, 80% resolved by AI.
AI-Hybrid Service Desk: Provided services to over 50 international enterprises, resolving the remaining 20% of customer inquiries through AI assistance, with product sales exceeding 21 million.
Inclusive Product For Disabled: Provided employment opportunities for 110,000 disabled people, saved $2M/month in costs.

items.company: Alibaba Group - Logistics & After-Sales Product Department
items.summary: Product Expert: Provided logistics and after-sales solutions for platform merchants.
bullets: Warehouse Video Intelligent Inspection Solution: Sold 50,000 units, saved $24M costs annually, filed technology patent.
Logistics Service AI Plugin: Integrated the ERP systems, sending over 60,000 abnormal logistics reminders to merchants daily, reducing Alibaba consumers refund rates by 30%.

items.company: Alibaba Group - Transaction Security Product Department
items.summary: Product Manager: Responsible for identifying high-risk transactions and providing VIP services.
bullets: Risk Transaction Prevention Product: Identified 1 million high-risk orders on average per month, with an automated processing rate reaching 20%.
VIP Service Product: Provided dedicated account managers for top 200 core merchants on Alibaba platform.
